Name: Preparation Room
WorldDescription: The preparation room assigned to elite squads. It has many built-in functions that are capable to tackle any emergency situation.

Name: Peaceful Courtyard
WorldDescription: A projected scene inspired by Kowloong courtyard. The falling leaves and air-conditioning system could bring Kowloong autumn to life in any season.

Name: Silver Light Church
WorldDescription: A projected scene inspired by the church in old times. The silver light of dawn shines through the windows. It is where the eternal oaths are made.

Name: Brilliant Seaside
WorldDescription: Inspired by the most popular holiday attraction of the Golden Age, this projected scene features a beautiful beach and relaxing waves bathed in the brilliant summer sunlight.

Name: Lost in Whitebloom
WorldDescription: That was the endpoint of her dreams, a place meant for silent slumber. Now, it holds a different meaning.

Name: Homeland
WorldDescription: May you all return home safe.

Name: Sinking Mermaid
WorldDescription: Will you remember the melody she hummed when you return?

Name: Shape of Thunder
WorldDescription: The mountain camellia stands tall, a distant thunder's roar, its echo fading.

Name: Floral Serenity
WorldDescription: A projected landscape modeled after a serene countryside. Bathed in sunlight, a river flows through blooming fields, exuding tranquility and peace.

Name: Ruins of Adieu
WorldDescription: A land abandoned by the divine, now a city lost to decay and ruin.

Name: A Love Story Across Time
WorldDescription: The singing of the saints witnesses the oath between Lucia and you.

Name: Dreams at Twilight
WorldDescription: Water lanterns glow softly, and purple wisteria drapes down. She stands on the water's surface, her toes lightly touching the ripples, and her long sleeves flow in the breeze.

Name: Golden Holiday
WorldDescription: The relief glows with an amber sheen in the interplay of light and shadow, while the cast-iron streetlamps hold the last notes of an old melody. The benches carry the weight of trailing scents, and shopfront arches spill a lazy fragrance into the air. Between the cracks in the bricks and the folds of light, time itself is brewed into golden memories.

Name: Her Merciful Gaze
WorldDescription: Your freedom knows no bounds, and no force can move your gears.
